awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: NSF-CBMS Regional Conference on      Harmonic Analysis, Real Function Spaces and Related Areas;  Auburn, AL; June 12-16, 1989
awd_abstract_narration: Professor Guido Weiss of Washington University, St. Louis,                 will be principal lecturer at an NSF-CBMS Regional Conference to                be held at Auburn University, Auburn, Alabama in June of 1989.                  The lectures will present certain general principles of harmonic                analysis that make it easier to understand a multitude of                       function spaces encountered in analysis and related areas, such                 as Lebesque spaces, Lipschitz spaces, Hardy spaces, Soboler                     spaces, etc., as well as some recent developments in harmonic                   analysis and partial differential equations.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
